record.title: ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 15, 2008, AT 3 P.M.
record.narrative:
ADJOURNMENT UNTIL MONDAY, SEPTEMBER 15, 2008, AT 3 P.M. -- (Senate - September 12, 2008)

[Page: S8501]

speaking.paragraph: If there is no further business to come before the Senate, I ask unanimous consent it stand adjourned under the previous order.

record.narrative: There being no objection, the Senate, at 12:34 p.m., adjourned until Monday, September 15, 2008, at 3 p.m.
